name: Solana RPC Flow ‚ö°
description: Solana RPC Flow is a tool for sending requests to Solana JSON-RPC endpoints without having to write code. It supports most standard RPC methods. It updates the URL and embeds your RPC endpoint and method call and params in the URL for easy sharing to any relevant parties.
